level.heading: COMMISSION ACTION ON THE ARBITRATION DECISION (ยง 15-2618) The Commission shall review the arbitration decision and issue an order todopt, reject, or modify the arbitration decision. If any arbitrating partyhooses to appeal the arbitration decision, that arbitrating party shall filets appeal with the Commission within ten (10) calendar days after the filing ofhe arbitration decision. An original and fifteen (15) copies of the appeal muste filed with the Commission Secretary, with a copy served on the arbitrator orrbitration panel and the other arbitrating party(ies) on the same day that theetition is filed with the Commission. The Commission shall have thirty (30)ays to review the appeal. The Commission shall adopt, modify, or reject therbitration decision by order no later than nine (9) months after the date onhich the telecommunications carrier requested negotiation.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5242 (June 23, 2000)EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8315 (October 20,000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2905 (March 19, 2004).
